about_the_game:
First of all

THIS GAME IS HARD

VERY HARD

BEST OF LUCK

You opened your eyes in a spaceship and found out that you are in an unfamiliar place. You tried to remember your arrival in this place but you can't remember clearly. Now you have chosen the only option you have left, Which is to escape from this so called planet Earth. Because your mind reminds you every time that you are very FARAWAY from your home.

Besides a simple but good physics and side scroll system, this game has a beautiful but yet dark environment where you are going to tackle obstacle, take right time and chance to move in this world where there is a chance of fall in every moment you move forward. And at last, you need to be a very patient person and do no harm to your PC in the possession of anger to complete this game. We hope you will enjoy this small piece of entertainment by XG games.
